options.name: configFile
options.desc: Path to Pomerium config YAML. If set, overridesservices.pomerium.settings.

options.name: enable
options.desc: Whether to enable the Pomerium authenticating reverse proxy.

options.name: secretsFile
options.desc: Path to file containing secrets for Pomerium, in systemdEnvironmentFile format. See the systemd.exec(5) man page.

options.name: settings
options.desc: The contents of Pomerium’s config.yaml, in Nix expressions.  Specifying configFile will override this in its entirety.  See  the Pomeriumconfiguration reference  for more information about what to puthere.

options.name: useACMEHost
options.desc: If set, use a NixOS-generated ACME certificate with the specifiedname.  Note that this will require you to use a non-HTTP-based challenge, ordisable Pomerium’s in-built HTTP redirect server by settinghttp_redirect_addr to null and use a different HTTP server for servingthe challenge response.  If you’re using an HTTP-based challenge, you should use thePomerium-native autocert option instead.
